title: Worchister Bible
description:
The Holy Bible Abridged; or, The History of the Old and New Testament. Illustrated with Notes and Adorned with Cuts, for the Use of childrens [sic]. The Second Worcester Edition. Worcester, [Mass.]: From the Press of Thomas, Son & Thomas, 1796.

This 1796 edition of The Holy Bible Abridged is similar in textual content to the 1792 New York edition printed by William Durrell, but includes a different set of illustrations. On display are woodcuts of Christ restoring the widow’s son to life (Luke 7:11–18) and Christ stilling the tempest (Luke 8:41–56).
